result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ronald Collins

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Ronald Collins in court.  Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont in court for Ronald Collins.  Attorney James C Griffin in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a plea and sentencing.  Defense informs the court that Mr. Collins would like to retain private counsel.  Court scheduled a status conference.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.
Status conference scheduled for December 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Ronald Collins in court.  Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont in court for Ronald Collins. Attorney Gerald Henry Alder in court for State of Wisconsin on behalf of Attorney James C Griffin. 

Case in court for a plea and sentencing.  Defense requests a brief adjournment.  Court scheduled the matter as requested.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Ronald Collins in court with attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
OFF THE RECORD via Zoom. Defense requests a plea and sentencing date. Case adjourned, Branch 2.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Ronald Collins in court with attorney Darryl Everett Smith.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held via Zoom.  Defense motion to withdraw as counsel is granted by the court. Defense counsel will notify Public Defender's Office to appoint new counsel for the defendant. Case adjourned for status of counsel hearing by Zoom.  Status conference scheduled for June 23, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
records.descr: Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Ronald Collins in court with Attorney Darryl Everett Smith via zoom.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for scheduling conference.  The scheduling conference was held via zoom.  Defense is requesting a status conference date.  The court will grant defense request and order the matter adjourned back to Branch 2 via zoom.  Status conference scheduled for May 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Ronald Collins in court with Attorney Darryl Everett Smith.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: Milwaukee County Deputy B. Shayhorn. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 02.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.

04:40 PM Defendant Ronald Collins in court with attorney Travis Schwantes.  Defendant Ronald Collins in custody.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Ronald Collins appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Childs, Branch 02.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
